detmode.title: Detector mode indicator
detmode.description: Detector mode indicator. The 4 possible values are: FLUSH_MODE, TEST_PATTERN, CLOCKING and EXPOSURE.  FLUSH_MODE: continuos destructive read of the detector.  TEST_PATTERN: Test pattern generated by the SCE.  CLOCKING: Detector is clocked but not readout. EXPOSURE: Detector readout mode. Nominal value.
detmode.calculation: Engineering value MIR_XX_CMD_DET_MODE, where XX is detector: IC for MIRIMAGE, LW for MIRIFULONG, SW for MIRIFUSHORT

cmd_tsel.title: Test pattern selection
cmd_tsel.description: Test patterns generated by the SCE. There are four different options.  COLUMNS: Each column has a constant value. Value per channel increments from 1 to 258 across detector frame.  ROWS: Each row has a constant value. Value increments from 1 to 1024 up the detector frame.  FRAMES: All pixels in a frame have a value corresponding to the countdown from the number of frames (e.g. all pixels in the first frame of a 10 frames commanded exposure will have the value 10).  ALL: Detector channel 1: column count. Channel 2: row count. Channel 3: frame count. Channel 4: Intregration count. Reference output values are zero.
cmd_tsel.calculation: Engineering value MIR_XX_CMD_TESTSEL, where XX is detector: IC for MIRIMAGE, LW for MIRIFULONG, SW for MIRIFUSHORT
